entry.title: rubentalstra/librechat-prom-exporter: A lightweight Node.js service built with Express, Mongoose, and prom-client that collects metrics from your LibreChat MongoDB database and exposes them on a "/metrics" endpoint for Prometheus scraping. Easily integrate with Grafana dashboards for comprehensive monitoring and visualization.
entry.content: A lightweight Node.js service built with Express, Mongoose, and prom-client that collects metrics from your LibreChat MongoDB database and exposes them on a "/metrics" endpoint for Prometheus scraping. Easily integrate with Grafana dashboards for comprehensive monitoring and visualization.
